definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Some floral shops accept orders for flowers and gifts to be sent to anywhere around the globe.
sentences.chinese: 有一些花店可以接受订单把花和礼物送住全球各地。

sentences.english: He searched for a flower shop and a local winery and found none.
sentences.chinese: 他想找家花店和当地的葡萄酒厂，但一无所获。

sentences.english: Duoli runs a florist and starts her new life. Hongyuan gives her full support.
sentences.chinese: 多丽开设花店，从新出发，宏远全力支持。

sentences.english: You ride to the nearest flower vendor and buy her a Black Rose.
sentences.chinese: 你策马离开最近的花店买了一朵黑玫瑰给她。

sentences.english: The Audrey II doesn't directly generate any money for Mushnik's Flower Shop.
sentences.chinese: 奥黛丽二世并没有直接为穆希尼的花店带来收益。

sentences.english: You may go to the flower shop and buy some fresh flowers for your wife.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去鲜花店给您的太太买一些鲜花。

sentences.english: Baoyong inwardly let out a long sigh of relief, tell the assistant of the studio to call for buying flowers.
sentences.chinese: 宝咏暗自松了口气，工作室吩咐助手打电话给花店。

sentences.english: On the way home one night, I spotted some fresh-cut roses outside a florist's shop. After.
sentences.chinese: 有一晚回家的路上，我在花店外看到一些刚剪的玫瑰。

sentences.english: Replace the store names with the files.
sentences.chinese: 利用文件替换花店名称。

sentences.english: This text has done some exploration on the realization of the online florist shop.
sentences.chinese: 本文就网上鲜花店的实现做了一些探索。

sentences.english: Then to the florists, you deserve a posy.
sentences.chinese: 然后去花店，你应该有花才对。

sentences.english: In my personal florist, I can flower arrangement or plant.
sentences.chinese: 在我的私人花店中，我可以插花或者种植。

sentences.english: So what do you think of the new flower shop?
sentences.chinese: 你认为那家新的鲜花店怎么样？

sentences.english: He drove quickly to the florist11 and told her he would take the flowers personally.
sentences.chinese: 他开车赶回花店，告诉店员，他将亲自去送花。

sentences.english: Then she came to a florist, want to buy a bunch of flowers to mom.
sentences.chinese: 然后她来到一家花店，想买一束花送给妈妈。

sentences.english: Insert a string for each of the stores.
sentences.chinese: 为每个花店插入一个字符串。
